GRF package¶

Submodules¶

GRF.GRF module¶

GRF builds the kernel for simulation study. - udpate the field. - assimilate data. - get eibv for a specific location.

class GRF.GRF.GRF¶

Bases: object

GRF kernel

assimilate_data(dataset: ndarray) → None¶

Assimilate dataset to GRF kernel. It computes the distance matrix between gmrf grid and dataset grid. Then the values are averged to each cell. :param dataset: np.array([x, y, sal]) :param cnt_waypoint: int

get_covariance_matrix() → ndarray¶

Return Covariance.

get_ei_field() → tuple¶
get_eibv_field() → ndarray¶

Return the computed eibv field, given which method to be called.

get_ivr_field() → ndarray¶

Return the computed ivr field, given which method to be called.

get_lateral_range() → float¶

Return lateral range.

get_mu() → ndarray¶

Return mean vector.

get_nugget() → float¶

Return nugget of the field.

get_sigma() → float¶

Return variability of the field.

get_threshold() → float¶

Return threshold.

Set lateral range.
